name: THE-BLOCK
description:
THE-BLOCK Is Game Made For Gdevelop Gamejam.

This Game Is Made By Me (Rushikesh) with Gdevelop  Open Source Game Engine For MY FIRST GAMEJAM AND ALSO OF GDEVELOP.

IT TOOK 3 DAYS.

NO SOUND EFFECTS (SORRY) {BECAUSE I DONT KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT MUSIC}

ASSETS :- CREATED BY ME (INKSCAPE & GDEVELOP)

Controls : -

ARROW KEYS = LEFT AND RIGHT MOVEMENT

SPACE = JUMP

R = RESTART

S = SAVE

L = LOAD

M = MAIN MENU

PRESS "R" WHEN YOU DIE TO CONTINUE.

YOU  CAN  LOAD GAME AGAIN WHEN YOU ENTER IN GAME WHEN YOU DIE JUST PRESS "L" OR CLICK ON "LOAD GAME " BUTTON.

"GAME BUTTONS HAVE NO ANIMATIONS"
